summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5548 for the improvement of 5th Avenue West, from West Bertona Street to West Dravus Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 71567 as amended by Ordinance No. 71766, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
